description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Justin Stone, between 1938 and 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 308 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Stone, Justin Jazz musicians--1930-1950.
